properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 8:05PM EST until February 7 at 10:21PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Chattooga River near Summerville affecting Chattooga County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Chattooga River near Summerville.
* Until Friday evening.
* At 745 PM Thursday the stage was 18.6 feet, and rising.
* Moderate flooding is occurring, and moderate flooding is forecast
to continue.
* Flood stage is 14 feet.
* The river will continue rising, reaching near 19.1 feet after
midnight early Friday morning. The river is expected to fall below
flood stage Friday afternoon.
* At 19 feet, significant flooding expands further into the woodlands
and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on
Rome Boulevard. In Trion, portions of the parking lot at Mount
Vernon Mills, yards of homes on First and Second Streets near the
levee, and athletic fields off Dalton Street are flooded with two
feet of water. The water reaches the personnel office foundation at
Mount Vernon Mills. Also, near Lyerly, portions of Lyerly Dam Road
near the river are flooded with two feet of water.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Friday evening
